alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 20 at 5:41PM MST until August 20 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 535 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Iron Springs and has now moved east-southeast. The thunderstorm is showing signs of weakening. Additional strong thunderstorms continue to impact areas southwest and west of Prescott. HAZARD...Up to quarter size hail, up to 40 mph winds, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Prescott, Yavapai Campground, Downtown Prescott, Ponderosa Park, Indian Hill West Prescott, Iron Springs and White Spar Campground. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
